function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on inaccurate information from social media","Impact":"Misinformation may lead to ineffective prevention measures and increase the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote fact-checking and information from reliable sources, educate the public on recognizing misinformation","Technologies":"Social media fact-checking tools, public health education campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health organizations, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of preventive advice in shared articles","Impact":"Lack of accurate preventive advice may result in ineffective protection against contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Validation of preventive advice by medical experts, promotion of evidence-based prevention strategies","Technologies":"Content validation tools, expert review platforms","People":"Readers of the shared articles","Owner":"Medical experts, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of relevant prevention information due to keyword selection","Impact":"Important preventive information may be missed, leading to incomplete understanding of effective prevention measures","Mitigation":"Broaden keyword selection to capture all relevant preventive information, review and analyze a diverse range of articles","Technologies":"Advanced search algorithms, natural language processing tools","People":"Researchers, public health analysts","Owner":"Research organizations, public health institutions"}]}
